reference.title: unctrl : translate characters to upper case

section.title: Description
section.p: unctrl is a macro which returns the printable representation of c as a string. unctrllen is a macro which returns the length of the printable representation of c.

section.title: Returns
section.p: unctrl returns a string of the printable representation of c. unctrllen returns the length of the string which is the printable representation of c.
